Located in the heart of downtown Bedford, Sun Tower is a high-quality suburban office building. The Bedford Hwy location provides easy access to Dartmouth, Hwy 102 and Hwy 101. High degree of walkability to amenities with Sunnyside Mall, Tim Hortons and numerous other options in the immediate area. The building has free parking on-site and direct access to public transit routes. See flyer for more!
Turn-key office space offering flexible open workspace, boardroom & private offices. Great for the new, growing or existing business. See flyer for more!

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Near Mill Cove, off the Bedford Highway
Near Mill Cove, off the Bedford Highway

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
- Waterfront view

- Landlord turnkey

- Doctor office with high-end finishes

- $18.00-$20.00 per SF

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Near Mill Cove, off the Bedford Highway
Near Mill Cove, off the Bedford Highway

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Technically engineered and controlled environment. Located in the heart of Bedford, next to the extensive boardwalk, marina, and a world class golf course.
9000-18000 sq. ft. of office space available. See flyer for more details!

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: West Bedford Centre, 8 Gary Martin Drive

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Ideally located in the rapidly growing West Bedford area on the high visibility corner of Hammonds Plains Road and Gary Martin Drive, this future development is positioned at a main entry point into the growing Stonington Park Subdivision and the Parks of West Bedford. This sought after community consists of new home construction, executive apartments and expansive parks and trails.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: West Bedford Centre, 8 Gary Martin Drive
